verses.verse: <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> for he has <S%H6213>done<s%> marvelous <S%H6381>things!<s%> His right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> have worked salvation for <S%H3467>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%> He has openly <S%H1540>shown<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

He has <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and his <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> All the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God.<s%>
Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all the <S%H776>earth!<s%> Burst out and <S%H6476>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> <S%H2167>yes,<s%> sing praises!
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> praises to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp,<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2172>melody.<s%>
With <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>ram<s%>'s horn, make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%> with its <S%H4393>fullness;<s%> the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and those who dwell <S%H3427>therein.<s%>
Let the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands.<s%> Let the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

Let them sing <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>
